page.title: 02Bromley High Street Survey
page.content: Bromley High Street is a commercial centre.Class 8 of Burnt Ash Junior School wanted to know why and how people visited the High Steet and where they came from.On the 5th June we conducted a survey to find out. The results showed that 46% came to shop, over half of these were buying clothes. 31% came to work, 10% to visit a bank and 3% to eat. Half came by car and 28% by bus. A surprising 13% walked and 9% travelled by train. Most were local people, 69% came from Bromley Borough, 55% travelled less than 5km and 78% less than 10km. 10% came from the rest of London and 12% from other parts of Kent, but 6% travelled over 35kmm to visit Bromley High Street. 38% came from Croydon,the nearest rival commercial centre.
